mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT N.*, M.M_NAME, P.* FROM QNA N, MEMBERS M, PRODUCT P WHERE N.Q_M_NO = M.M_NO AND N.Q_P_NO = P.P_NO AND ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' (Q_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR Q_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') ORDER BY N.Q_NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
